verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwa-na Bwa-na utuhurumi-e
Bwa-na Bwa-na
utuhurumie x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kristu Kri-stu Kristu
Kristu utuhu-rumi-e
Kri-stu Kri-stu utuhu-ru-mie,
Kristu Kristu
utuhu-rumi-e. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwa-na Bwa-na utuhurumi-e,
Bwa-na Bwa-na utuhurumi-e,
Bwa-na Bwa-na utuhurumi-e
utuhurumi-e,
Bwa-na utuhurumi-e Bwa-na
Bwa-na utuhurumi-e.
